content.rendered:
Directed by Rumi Jaffery

Written by Rumi Jaffery. Ranjit Kapoor

Cast Amitabh Bachchan(Adv. Lateef Zaidi). Emraan Hashmi(Sameer Mehra). Krystle D’Souza(Natasha Oswal). Annu Kapoor(Adv. Paramjeet Singh Bhullar). Rhea Chakraborty(Anna). Raghuvir Yadav(Hariya Jatav). Dhritiman Chatterjee(Justice (Retd.) Jagdhish Acharya). Siddhant Kapoor(Joe). Samir Soni(G. S. Oswal (as Sameer Soni)). Alexx O’Nell(Richard). Abhinay Raj Singh(Raaj). Md Anan Islam(Imraan). Fam boy Sameer(Nandu).Chobber Sidhu

Language Hindi

Producers Romanchak Arora. Aish Pandit. Anand Pandit. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Ramesh Pulapaka. Dharmendra Rawal. Ravi Sarin. Vaishal Shah. Sameer M Upadhyay. Maciej Zemojcin.

Production Anand Pandit Motion Pictures.. Saraswati Entertainment
